colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM THAMS CAD KYI GZHI RTEN KHO NAR GYUR BA SKYABS 'GRO SEMS BSKYED KYI NYAMS LEN GSAL BYED BKLAG TSUL GO BDE BA SLOB MA'I RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSNGAGS 'OS YON TAN DU MA'I RGYAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS, CHOS LA BLO MIG YANGS PA DANG BRTZON LDAN PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL SOGS KYIS SNGA PHYIR 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^MKHAS SHING GRUB DBANG PHYUG RJE BTZUN DAM TSIG RDO RJE DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG RGYUN LAS LEGS PAR BTUS NAS, BLA MA DE NYID KYI BKA' DRIN KHO NAS 'TSO BA'I BTZUN GZUGS SNYOM LAS PA, ^DHARMA BI DZA YAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
